about_the_game:
A collection of art concept setting of Surmount
Surmount Digital Artbook

This set contains a large number of creative sketches,unapplied originals and set art materials in the development stage.
Hairstyle?POSE?Clothes?A large number of unused character design sketches will appear in this Art Book!
NPC's design plans will also appear,and some undisclosed CG process sketches.

[HOW TO USE]
In the start menu of the game,click the"art book"button to enter this Art Book.
detailed_description:
A collection of art concept setting of Surmount
Surmount Digital Artbook

This set contains a large number of creative sketches,unapplied originals and set art materials in the development stage.
Hairstyle?POSE?Clothes?A large number of unused character design sketches will appear in this Art Book!
NPC's design plans will also appear,and some undisclosed CG process sketches.

[HOW TO USE]
In the start menu of the game,click the"art book"button to enter this Art Book.

name: Surmount - Art Book

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2GB
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 4GB
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: This is additional content to Surmount, not include the game.
